SA19bsa072_u:4_0: iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo 'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpādyate /
SA19bsa072_u:4_7: marīcikāsu vā jalajñānasya / apūrvo gocaro asyetyapūrvagocaram /
SA19bsa072_u:4_8: gocaro viṣayo ghaṭādiḥ / tasmādutpannaṃ tadarthaprāpaṇayogyaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:5_0: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt? ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:5_1: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:5_2: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarūpaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:5_4: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām,
SA19bsa072_u:5_6: jñānasya kimāyātam? // kṣaṇikaṃ sannapi pramāṇasya saṃgatiḥ
SA19bsa072_u:6_3: kṣaṇikatvāt kiṃ ca, rūpaṃ dṛṣṭa, prāpyate ca spraṣṭavyam / tato 'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām /
SA19bsa072_u:6_4: na, yadi nāma vastuto 'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:8_2: tataśca kathaṃ tatsamyagjñānamiti cet? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:8_5: tathā hi - yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ samarthaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:8_6: tathāpi dāhapākāvagāhanasnānapānonmajjanāddyarthakriyāṃ dūrato 'nubhavato narasya darśanenoccalad dhūmādidarśanena cāvadhārayati /
SA19bsa072_u:9_0: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet? na /
SA19bsa072_u:15_0: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti /
SA19bsa072_u:17_0: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:17_1: kasyacittu parataḥ / yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:17_2: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:19_0: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:19_3: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo 'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarūpam,
SA19bsa072_u:19_4: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:21_0: samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam /
SA19bsa072_u:23_3_0: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ
SA19bsa072_u:23_3_1: pratyakṣaṃ na syāt? atrocyate- pratigatamakṣamiti yaduktaṃ tatpratyakṣaśabdasyāvyutpattimātranimittaṃ
SA19bsa072_u:23_5: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarūpamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:25_0_0: mīyate 'rtho 'neneti mānam / anuḥ paścādarthe / paścānmānamanumānam / liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ
SA19bsa072_u:25_0_1: paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:27_0: dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante /
SA19bsa072_u:27_1: tathā hi pratyakṣamevaikaṃ pramāṇamiti cārvākaḥ / pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śābdaṃ ceti sāṃkhyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:29_0: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham /
SA19bsa072_u:29_1: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam /
SA19bsa072_u:31_1: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati /
SA19bsa072_u:31_7: nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ syāt?
SA19bsa072_u:33_2: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:33_3: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:33_7: nāpi tadutpattiḥ / nāpi tadutpattiḥ, anvayavyatirekābhāvāt / tasmāt tadutpattirityevaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
SA19bsa072_u:33_8: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:34_0: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:34_2: yogyatā mātreṇaiva pradīpāt ghaṭādipratītivat na caitadasti /
SA19bsa072_u:35_0: tathā hi - abhinavo nālikeradvīpādāyātaḥ pumānagniśabdaṃ śrutvāpyagniśabdānna kiñcidartha pratyetīti /
SA19bsa072_u:35_1: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:36_1: tathā ca so 'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ sambaddha iti praṣṭavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:36_3: caturtho 'pi teṣu kena sambandhena sambaddhaḥ? pañcamena kenaciccet,
SA19bsa072_u:37_0: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:37_1: tanna / yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:37_2: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:37_3: yena sambandhāntaranirapekṣa evaṃ paraṃ sambadhnāti? taduyuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:37_5: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:37_6: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:37_7: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:37_8: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti,
SA19bsa072_u:37_10: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:37_17: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti /
SA19bsa072_u:37_18: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam /
SA19bsa072_u:37_19: kathaṃ tarhi sarvo 'yamasandigdho laukiko vyavahāra iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:37_20: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:39_0: naiyāyikasyopamānaprapañcaḥ / yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam,
SA19bsa072_u:39_1: sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti /
SA19bsa072_u:39_2: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
SA19bsa072_u:39_3: kīdṛśo gavaya iti / sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:39_4: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ phalasvarūpāṃ janayatpramāṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:39_6: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:39_7: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:39_8: sa ca paramārthato nāsti / dṛśyatve tasyānupalambhena bādhā /
SA19bsa072_u:39_10: kiṃ ca - sa hi sambandhaḥ sambadhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
SA19bsa072_u:39_11: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam /
SA19bsa072_u:40_4: tanna yuktam / yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati /
SA19bsa072_u:42_1: tathā hi, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:42_2: na ca sadṛśavastuno 'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
SA19bsa072_u:42_3: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā dṛśyānulambhagrastametat /
SA19bsa072_u:42_4: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:42_5: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā /
SA19bsa072_u:42_7: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikalddhapyate /
SA19bsa072_u:44_1: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:44_3_0: tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo
SA19bsa072_u:44_3_1: va pratibandho 'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vāsau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva /
SA19bsa072_u:44_4: atha nāsti pratibandhaḥ, tadānīmarthāpattiḥ pramāṇameva na bhavati,
SA19bsa072_u:46_0: abhāvasya svarūpameva tāvannopalabhāmahe, kuta eva tasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA19bsa072_u:47_1: tatra keyamanutpattiḥ? kiṃ prasajyavṛtyā pramāṇānutpattimātram? atha paryudāsavṛtyā vastvantaram? vastvantaramapi jaḍarūpaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:47_2: jñānarūpaṃ vā? jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā? tatra na tāvat prasajyarūpo 'bhāvo yujyate /
SA19bsa072_u:47_3: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet? ata eva kenāpi na tatpratidyate /
SA19bsa072_u:49_1: na hi jaḍarūpaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti /
SA19bsa072_u:51_2: yathā vijñapuruṣasya so 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:52_0: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta,
SA19bsa072_u:52_4: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA19bsa072_u:52_5: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta? na /
SA19bsa072_u:52_6: arthasvarūpasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:53_0: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:55_2: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam,
SA19bsa072_u:56_0: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti //
SA19bsa072_u:57_0: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
SA19bsa072_u:57_1: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarva śabdena bhāsate // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:58_0: tannirastam / tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva /
SA19bsa072_u:61_0: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:62_0: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet? na tato vastuprāptiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:64_0: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti /
SA19bsa072_u:68_2: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurūpaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:70_6: tato yaduktaṃ pareṇātraḥ 'gṛhītagrāhitvamandhabadhirādyabhāvo yogijñānasyāpi mānasatvaprasaṅgaḥ avyavahāritvaṃ ca' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:70_7: tannirastam / tathā hi - dvitīyakṣaṇagrahaṇāt gṛhītagrāhitvasya nirāsaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:71_0: `dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo rūpaṃ gṛhyate, cakṣuṣā tadākṛṣṭenamanasā ca' iti //
SA19bsa072_u:72_2: na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi viśuddhiranena pratipāditeti prayojanam /
SA19bsa072_u:75_2: citte bhāvāḥ caittāḥ, vastuno viśeṣarūpagrāhakā sukhaduḥkhopakṣālakṣaṇāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:75_3: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rūpeṇa tatsvarūpamātmasvarūpasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate /
SA19bsa072_u:76_0: atra kecidāhuḥ - na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:76_1: svātmani kriyāvirodhāt / na ca suśikṣito 'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti /
SA19bsa072_u:76_3: na hi prajjvalito 'pi vahniskandha ātmānaṃ dahati /
SA19bsa072_u:76_4: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:77_1: vṛkṣasūtradhārayoriva / atrocyate, na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:78_0: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA19bsa072_u:82_0: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate /
SA19bsa072_u:82_1: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:82_2: upakāryopakārakatvābhāvāt, savyetaragoviṣāṇayoriva / nāpi bhinnakālabhāvinā, kṣaṇikatvāt, prakāśitavyasyaivābhāvāt / api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:82_5: tathā hi - artho viśeṣyaḥ, jñāta iti viśeṣaṇam, jñāto jñānena viśeṣita iti / jñānaṃ cetsvayaṃ na bodharūpeṇa pratītaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:82_7: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam /
SA19bsa072_u:84_0: tadasādhu / prastute 'nupayogāt / na hi cakṣū rūpasya viśeṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:84_1: kiṃ tarhi? cakṣurvijñānāsaṃvedane kathaṃ jñāyatāmiti codyamakṣatameva /
SA19bsa072_u:86_0: yathā ca rūpādiprakāśanyathānupapatyā indriyasiddhiḥ, tathā jñānasyāpi siddhiriti /
SA19bsa072_u:88_0: na hi kaścidajñāte 'rthe buddhimupalabhate / jñāte tvanumānādavagacchati iti //
SA19bsa072_u:91_1: tadapi cāyuktam / prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarūpatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarūpatā,
SA19bsa072_u:91_2: jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt / viṣayādarthāntaratve jaḍatāyāṃ tasyāpi svataḥ prakāśāyogāt /
SA19bsa072_u:91_6: anubhavaprasiddhaṃ ca svasaṃvedanatva kathamapahnuyeta? taduktam - apratyakṣopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhayati /
SA19bsa072_u:93_0: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:93_1: parokṣasya svarūpaṃ kastasya lakṣayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:94_1: pītaśaṅkhādijñānasyābhrāntatvaṃ ca kathaṃ na bhavet? ucyate - vikalpajñānamapi svātmani nirvikalpameva /
SA19bsa072_u:97_1: tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:99_2: yogo 'syāstīti yogī / yogino yat jñānaṃ tatpratyakṣam /
SA19bsa072_u:100_0: nanu bhāvanā vikalpaḥ, vikalpaścāvastuviṣayaḥ, tatkathaṃ vastunaḥ sphuṭībhāvo bhavatu /
SA19bsa072_u:100_1: kathaṃ vā vikalpo nirvikalpatāṃ vrajet? kṣaṇikaṃ ca citaṃ kathamekāgrībhavati? viśeṣaśca kasya kena vā kriyatām? śarīrī ca rāgādivirahānmuktaśceti sarvamasaṃgatam /
SA19bsa072_u:100_2: atrocyate - avastuviṣayo 'pi vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:100_6: kāmaśokādivat / na hi dṛṣṭe kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma /
SA19bsa072_u:101_0: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati /
SA19bsa072_u:101_2: nityavādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:102_0: yattu śarīritve sukhaduḥkhayorbhāvādanugrahanigrahāt śarīrī rāgādivirahānmukta śceti vighaṭanamuktaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:102_1: tadayuktam / na hi śarīraṃ rāgādihetuḥ, kiṃ tu avidyā / anitye nityamiti, anātmanyātmeti, duḥkhe sukhamiti, aśucau śuciteti, caturvipayāsasvabhāvā mithyopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:102_3: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ paśyata eva sukhābhikāṅkṣaṇādisukhaheturātmīyaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:102_7: kuta eva rāgādiyogāḥ? tasmājjīvaccharīre satyapi avidyāvirahāt sarvasaṅgavirahalakṣaṇā muktirvītarāgāṇāṃ bhavatīti sarvaṃ susthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:104_0: tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam / tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:106_0: nanu yadi svalakṣaṇameva pratyakṣasya viṣayo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīṃ dhūmadahanasāmānyayorvyāptiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām? nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:106_2: na tvanyayogavyavacchedena svalakṣaṇameva tasya viṣaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:108_1: tatra pratyakṣasya pratibhāsamānaṃ svalakṣaṇam eko grāhyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:108_3: tacca sāmānyaṃ dvividham, ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ tiryaglakṣaṇaṃ ceti /
SA19bsa072_u:108_4: tatraikasyāmeva ghaṭādivyaktau sajātīyavyāvṛttāyāmanekakṣaṇasamudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ sādhanapratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:108_8: pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratipādane paroktāḥ ṣaṭ padārthā na viṣayā ityuktam yathā - avayavidravyaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:108_9: guṇaḥ, karma, sāmānyaṃ, viśeṣaḥ, samavāyaśceti / na caiṣāṃ pratyakṣe jñāne pratibhāso 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:108_11: atiprasaṅgāt / tathā hi - ghaṭādau paridṛśyamāne pūrvāparādibhāgaṃ vihāya nānyatkiñcidekamavayavidravyamupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:109_0: bhāgā eva hi bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
SA19bsa072_u:112_0: nanu pramitirūpāṃ kriyāṃ phalabhūtāṃ niṣpādayajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:112_1: tatra kāsau pramitiḥ, yāṃ janajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti cet? ucyate - iha nīlāderarthāt jñānaṃ dvirūpamutpadyate nīlākāraṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:112_2: nīlabodhasvabhāvaṃ ca / tatrānīlākāravyāvṛtyā nīlākāraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:114_0: etacca vikalpapratyayena bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate paramārthatastu nāstyeva bhedaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:117_2: tadānākāratvena sarvatra viṣaye tulyatvāt vibhāgena viṣayavyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA19bsa072_u:117_3: yatpunaḥ kecidāhuḥ - pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ uttaraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalamiti,
SA19bsa072_u:117_4: tathā hi prathamakṣaṇabhāvi tāvajjñānaṃ pramāṇaphalabhūtasya dvitīyajñānasyānutpatteḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:117_5: phalabhūtajñānotpattau ca pūrvasya kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt kathaṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati? nāpi samānakālabhāvi jñānaṃ phalamucitam,
SA19bsa072_u:121_2: parvatādau dharmiṇi dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā yasya pratipattuḥ vahnijñānamutpadyate,
SA19bsa072_u:121_3: sa eva tena jñānena parokṣamarthaṃ pratipadyate nānya iti svārthānumānamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:121_5: trirūpaliṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ paraṃ pratipādayati jñāpayatīti kṛtvā vacanamapyanumānaśabdenocyate,
SA19bsa072_u:123_2: tat svārthānumānam / tacca dharmaviśeṣa sambandhitayā sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścaya ityeke /
SA19bsa072_u:126_0: samprati liṅgasya trirūpatvamucyate - anumeye satvameva niścitam /
SA19bsa072_u:126_6: tacca śabde dharmiṇi nāsti / evakāreṇa pakṣaikadeśāsiddhasya nirāsaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:128_1: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ / pakṣeṇa saha sadṛśo dṛṣṭāntadharmītyarthaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:128_2: sapakṣa eva satvaṃ niścitamityanvayasaṃjñakaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:128_9: tacca sapakṣe ākāśādau vipakṣe ca ghaṭādau sarvatrāstīti sādhāraṇamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:128_10: sattvaśabdāt pūrvasminnevakāreṇa sarvasapakṣāvyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
SA19bsa072_u:128_14: iṣṭapuruṣe sapakṣe ca vaktṛtvamasarvajñatvena vyāptamavyāptaṃ vā na jñāyate /
SA19bsa072_u:130_1: na sapakṣo 'sapakṣaḥ / tatrāsattvameva niścitaṃ vyatirekasaṃjñakaṃ tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:130_4: viruddho hi vipakṣe 'sti / evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasya vipakṣaikadeśavṛtternirāsaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:130_6: ākāśādau nāsti / tato niyamenāsya nirāsaḥ / asattvavacanātpūrvasminnavadhāraṇe ayamarthaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:130_7: vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:130_9: tato na hetuḥ syāt, tataḥ pūrva na kṛtamiti / niścitagrahaṇena sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikasya nirāsaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:130_11: rathyāpuruṣavat / yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti tatra vaktṛtvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:130_12: yathopalakhaṇḍe / yadi nāma pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi na jñāyate kimavītarāgatvanivṛttyā pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādbaktṛtvaṃ nivṛttaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:132_0: nanu sapakṣa eva sattyamityukte sāmārthyādevāsapakṣe cāsattvamiti gamyate /
SA19bsa072_u:132_2: te ca trividha eva vipakṣo bhavatīti manyante /
SA19bsa072_u:132_3: sādhyābhāvamātraṃ, sādhyādanyaḥ, sādhyena saha viruddhaśca prayoganiyamārthamiti kecit /
SA19bsa072_u:132_4: anvayaprayogo vyatirekaprayogo vā niyamavānekaḥ prayoktavyo na dvāvapīti /
SA19bsa072_u:134_1: trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni trirūpāṇi trīṇyeva liṅgāni /
SA19bsa072_u:134_2: kāryaṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgam / svābhāvastrirūpaṃ liṅgam / anupalabdhistrirūpaṃ liṅgam /
SA19bsa072_u:136_0: tatra kāryaṃ yathā - yatra dhūmastatrāgniryathā mahānase,
SA19bsa072_u:136_2: anye tu pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyamāhuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:136_5: tathā cāyaṃ, tasmādagniriti / etaccāyuktam / pratijñāvacanamātrātsambandharahitāt sādhyapratipatterayogāt /
SA19bsa072_u:136_9: yatra pratijñaiva nāsti tatra pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti sarvamāmūlaṃ viśīrṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:138_5: na rūpādrasānumānam / atra rūpe janayitavye pūrvakaṃ rūpamupādānam /
SA19bsa072_u:141_0: svabhāvo yathā - svabhāvaḥ svasattāmātrabhāvini sādhyadharme yo heturucyate sa tasya sādhyasya dharmasya svabhāvo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:142_4: abhede 'pi kaścitpratipattā śiṃśapāvyavahāraṃ kṛtvā tatra vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ prāk kṛtamapi vyāmohāt kiñcidāropya punarna karoti /
SA19bsa072_u:142_6: tasmādetayoḥ paramārthata ekatve 'pi vikalpabuddhau vyāvṛttisamāśrayeṇa samutpannāyāṃ bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanatvaṃ na virudhyata iti /
SA19bsa072_u:145_0: nanvasataḥ kathaṃ dṛśyatā? ekendriyajñānagrāhyo pradeśādāvupalabhyamāne yadi ghaṭaḥ syāt dṛśya eva bhavediti /
SA19bsa072_u:145_2_0: na tu dṛśya eva / tasyānupalabdheriti hetuḥ / sa caikajñānasaṃsargipadārthādekajñānasaṃsargipadārthopalambhādvā
SA19bsa072_u:145_2_1: niścīyata iti tadubhayaṃ karmakartṛbhāvena paryudāsavṛttyā anupalabdhirucyate,
SA19bsa072_u:145_4: taddhi svayameva na kiñciditi kathaṃ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:145_7: tasmānniṣedhyādanyadviśiṣṭameva vastudvayaṃ pradeśaḥ pradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiriti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:147_0: ata evābhāvo na sādhyate / tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇaiva siddhatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:147_2_0: tathā hi - kaścinmūḍho rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu sāṃkhyaprasiddheṣu guṇeṣvanupalambhena pravarttitābhāvabyavahāro
SA19bsa072_u:147_2_1: 'pi punaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatrāstīti svasiddhāntābhyāsāt kvāpi pradeśādau ghaṭānupalambhe
SA19bsa072_u:147_2_2: satyapi nābhāvavyavahāraṃ karotītyanupalambhena trividho vyavahāraḥ kāryate /
SA19bsa072_u:147_4: ghaṭo nāstīti vācikaḥ / īdṛśa eva antarjalpākāro mānasikaśceti /
SA19bsa072_u:147_5: anupalabdhertādātmyatadutpattisambandhanirūpaṇam anupalambhasya karmadharmapakṣe sādhyena saha [sādṛśye] tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandho boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:147_8: asadvyavahārayogyatvaṃ ca tasya svabhāvaḥ [na kārya] jñānaṃ tu pradeśasya kāryamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:149_1: kathaṃ tarhi kāryasvabhāvābhyāmanupalabdherbhedaḥ? pratiṣedhasādhanāt bhedau na vastutaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:149_3_0: ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetuḥ iti / upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaviśiṣṭena deśavipakṛṣṭe sumervādau
SA19bsa072_u:151_3: na tvabhāvaḥ / tasya pratyakṣeṇaiva siddhatvādityuktaṃ prāk] yathāhanyāyavādī -
SA19bsa072_u:154_1: tadā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sākṣātprayoktuṃ na śakyata iti kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ prayujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:154_7: dhūmābhāvāt / pratiṣedhyānāṃ hi dhūmakāraṇānāṃ kārya dhūmaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_13: vahneriti / pratiṣedhyasy śītasparśasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya viruddho vahniḥ tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:154_16: na sarvaṃ kāraṇām, tato viśeṣaṇopādānam / pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_17: tasya viruddho vahniḥ, tasyehopalabdhiḥ / (7) kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhiryathā - nāsya romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ santi,
SA19bsa072_u:154_24: nātra śītasparśaḥ, dhūmāt / pratiṣedhyasya śītasparśasya yaḥ svabhāvastasya viruddho 'gniḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_25: tasya kārya dhūmaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (10) kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṃṇāni santi dhūmāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:154_27: tasya viruddho vahniḥ, tasya kāryaṃ dhūmaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (11) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - na romaharṣādiviśeṣayukta sparśavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:154_29: tasya viruddho 'gniḥ, tasya kāryaṃ dhūmaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (12) vyāpakaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - nātra tuṣārasparśaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_31: tasya viruddho 'gniḥ, tasya kāryaṃ dhūmaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (13) svabhāvaviruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā - nātra vahniḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_32: tuṣārasparśāt / pratiṣedhyasya hi vahneryaḥ svabhāvastasya viruddhaṃ śītam,
SA19bsa072_u:154_33: tena vyāptastuṣārasparśaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (14) kāryaviruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā - nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni vahnikāraṇāni santi,
SA19bsa072_u:154_35: tasya viruddhaṃ śītam, tena vyāptastuṣārasparśaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (15) kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā - nātra dhūmastuṣārasparśāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:154_37: tasya viruddhaṃ śītam, tena vyāptastuṣārasparśaḥ, tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / (16) vyāpakaviruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā - nāyaṃ nityaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:154_41: tasya cehopalabdhiḥ / ete ca kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ pañcadaśa prayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhisvabhāvā eva pratipattavyāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:154_44: na tvābhāvaḥ / tasya ca pratyakṣeṇaiva siddhatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:161_1: saṃskṛtasya sarvasya kṣaṇika tvasamarthanaṃ ca tatra svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ darśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya bhagavatā yaduktaṃ -
SA19bsa072_u:163_0: tad vyutpādyate / sametya sambhūya hetupratyayaiḥ kṛtaṃ vastujātaṃ saṃskṛtam /
SA19bsa072_u:164_0: `sarvaṃ tāvat ghaṭādikaṃ vastu mudgarādisannidhau nāśaṃ gacchat dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:164_1: tatra yena svarūpeṇa antyāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vinaśyati taccet svarūpamutpannamātrasya vidyate tadānīmutpādānantarameva tena vinaṣṭavyamiti vyaktamasya kṣaṇikatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:165_0: athedṛśa eva svabhāvastasya svahetorjātaḥ, yat kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitvā vinaśyatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:166_0: `evaṃ tarhi mudgarādisannidhāne ca eṣa eva asya svabhava iti punarapyanena tāvantameva kālaṃ sthātavyam,
SA19bsa072_u:166_2: tasmāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvenāpyutpattau prathamakṣaṇavad dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvāt punaraparaṃ kṣaṇadvayamavatiṣṭheta /
SA19bsa072_u:167_1: balena virodhakena mudgarādinā vināśyata iti? tadasat,
SA19bsa072_u:167_2: kathaṃ punaretadyujyate, na ca tadvinaśyati sthāvaratvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:167_3: vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti? na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:168_0: atha vinaśyati, kathaṃ tarhyavinaśvaraṃ tadvastu svahetorjātam? na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:168_2: dṛṣṭatvācca nāśasya, naśvarameva tadvastu svahetorupajāta ityaṅgīkurmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:168_5: prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyat vinaśvarasvarūpaṃ tattadanantarānavasthāyi yathā antyakṣaṇavartighaṭasya svarūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:170_0: yadi kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt? ucyate -
SA19bsa072_u:171_1: tenākāreṇa vailakṣaṇyasyābhāvād bhāvena cāvyavadhānāt bhede 'pi sa evāyamityabhedādhyavasāyapratyayaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ prasūyate /
SA19bsa072_u:171_2: atyantabhinneṣvapi ca lūnapunarjātakuśakeśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa eva sa evāyamiti pratyayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:171_3: tathehāpi kiṃ na sambhāvyate? tasmātsarva saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhamevaitat nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorayaṃ prayoga iti /
SA19bsa072_u:171_5: yathā ghaṭaḥ / santaścāmī pramāṇapratītāḥ / tathāparo 'pi vedasya pauruṣayatvasādhanāya svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:174_1: yathā ghaṭaḥ / utpattimāṃśca śabdaḥ / anutpannebhyo vyāvṛtto bhāva utpanna ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:174_2: yadā saiva vyāvṛttirvyāvṛttyantaravyavacchedena vyatiriktocyate bhāvasyotpattiriti tadā kalpitena bhedena svabhāvabhūtadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:176_0: tathā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ - yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:176_1: kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ / nanu citraguriti bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:176_2: yathā cātra citragośabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācako 'sti na tathā kṛtakaśabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakaṃ kimapyasti /
SA19bsa072_u:176_3: tatkathaṃ bhinnaviśeṣaṇasyodāharaṇamiti ced? ucyate - apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:176_4: tatraḥ kṛtakaśabdaḥ paravyāpārasāpekṣaṃ svabhābaṃ prakṛtyaiva vadan bhinnaviśeṣaṇamevāha /
SA19bsa072_u:178_0: prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvasya prayogaḥ - yaḥ pratyayabhedabhedī sa kṛtakaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:178_2: pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ, tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī /
SA19bsa072_u:178_3: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo 'yam /
SA19bsa072_u:178_4: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum /
SA19bsa072_u:180_0: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadānantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararūpaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:180_2: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti boddhavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:180_3: tathāparo 'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:180_4: yathā gaganāravinde / saṃśca śabdaḥ / tathā yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapi,
SA19bsa072_u:180_5: yathā kūrmaromṇi / utpattimāṃśca śabdaḥ / yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatra kṛtakamapi,
SA19bsa072_u:180_6: yathā śaśaśriṅge / kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ / yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:180_7: yathā gagane / pratyayabhedabhedī ca śabda iti /
SA19bsa072_u:182_0: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:182_1: yathā mahānase, dhūmaścātra / kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:182_2: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade /
SA19bsa072_u:184_0: anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo 'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyam,
SA19bsa072_u:184_1: yathā naraśirasi śṛṅgam / nopalabhyate cātropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ parābhimato 'vayavī ghaṭaśabdavācyeṣu kapāleṣu /
SA19bsa072_u:186_0: anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva,
SA19bsa072_u:186_1: yathā nīlādiviśeṣaḥ / neha upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhirghaṭasyeti /
SA19bsa072_u:188_0: sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam /
SA19bsa072_u:188_1: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:189_0: niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:189_1: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta,
SA19bsa072_u:189_2: sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:190_0: yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na siddhā,
SA19bsa072_u:190_4: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt,
SA19bsa072_u:190_6: tathā hi, loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ kecinniścitakartṛkāḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:190_7: yathā ghaṭādayaḥ / kecinniścitakartṛnivṛttayaḥ, yathā vyomādayaḥ / anye punaḥ sandigdhakartṛkāḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:190_9: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā buddhimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:190_10: ghaṭādivat / nāyamasiddho hetuḥ, kāryatvasya sarvoṣāṃ pramāṇasiddhatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:190_11: nāpi viruddhaḥ, sapakṣe bhāvāt / na cānaikāntaḥ, sādhyaviparyaye bādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:190_12: tathāhi - kārya tāvat buddhimataḥ kumbhakārādupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyena mānasa pratyakṣeṇopalabdham /
SA19bsa072_u:191_0: tadyadi buddhimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ buddhimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta /
SA19bsa072_u:191_2: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na buddhimaddhetukamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:191_3: atredamabhidhīte - sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam /
SA19bsa072_u:191_4: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:191_6: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
SA19bsa072_u:193_1: evaṃ dhūme 'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna /
SA19bsa072_u:193_2: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:193_3: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena buddhimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:193_4: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa buddhimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya buddhimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:194_0: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] siddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:200_3: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:200_6: tadapi sandigdhāsiddham / pratyayāntaravaikalyenāhatya vyabhicārasyādarśane 'pi sarvatra niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:202_0: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ, na sarva, tathā mamāpyanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva
SA19bsa072_u:203_0: dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambaddhaṃ na sarvam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:204_0: tanna yuktam / yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasiddhiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho 'pi pramāṇasiddhaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:204_1: yenaivamucyate? kiñca svābhāvikasambandha iti ko 'rthaḥ? kiṃ svato bhūtaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:204_2: svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:204_3: tatra na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt / nāpi dvitīyaḥ, tadutpattisambandhasvīkāraprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:205_0: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:205_4: na svasannidhimātreṇa / tathāhi - na tāvadākāśe sādhyābhāvena sadhanābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:205_5: ākāśe hi yathā buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva /
SA19bsa072_u:205_8: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:205_9: yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā svābhāvikādisambandhaḥ pūrvapramāṇena na prasādhitaḥ syādityuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:207_1: tathā hi, vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:207_5: nirdhūmasyāpi vahnerbhānāt / yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:211_0: `viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:212_0: atrocyate - nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ sārvatrikaḥ / tathā cābhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:212_1: tathā hi - [kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:212_5: ato na parihartavyaḥ, tasya copanyāso 'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:212_6: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:214_0: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:214_4: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabuddhimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:214_5: yenāsyāpi dṛśyatā syāt / tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:214_8: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA19bsa072_u:214_9: tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇena vyāpterasiddheranaikāntikatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:214_10: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt siddhirucyate? tanna yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:214_11: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:214_20: ekatvasiddhau sidhtyetat / na caikatvaṃ siddham / anekakartṛpūrvakatve 'pi kāryatvasya sambhavāt /
SA19bsa072_u:214_23_0: tarhi ghaṭasyāpīśvarapūrvakatvasiddhau kuto dṛṣṭāntatvam? atha kumbhakārasya kartṛtvaṃ
SA19bsa072_u:214_23_1: dṛṣṭaṃ kathamapākriyate? kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate? nāpi
SA19bsa072_u:214_24: dṛṣṭatvādeveti / tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:216_0: nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:216_2: na tvanvayaḥ / tatkathamābhyāṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet,
SA19bsa072_u:216_3: naiṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt sādharmyavati ca sādhanavākye,
SA19bsa072_u:216_5: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve 'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:216_9: anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na bhavediti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:216_10: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:218_1: yena ca pramāṇena, tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit /
SA19bsa072_u:218_5: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā /
SA19bsa072_u:218_9: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasiddhervikalpasiddhervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi,
SA19bsa072_u:218_12: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva /
SA19bsa072_u:218_13: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit,
SA19bsa072_u:220_5: ghaṭavat / ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:220_6: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano 'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:220_7: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:220_9: ghaṭavat, ākāśavaditi / sādhāraṇanaikāntiko yathā - nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:220_10: ghaṭavat ākāśavat / , sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko yathā - saḥ śyāmastatputratvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:221_0: yaduktaṃ prāk, sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti,
SA19bsa072_u:221_1: tatra ko 'yaṃ prasaṅgo nāma? pramāṇaprasiddhavyāptikena vākyena parasyāniṣṭatvāpādanāya prasañjanam prasaṅgaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:221_3: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālapham /
SA19bsa072_u:221_4: anekavṛtti ca sāmānyam / tasmādanenāpyanekena bhavitavyamiti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:223_0: athānekatvaṃ neṣyate, tadānekavṛttitvaṃ ca mā svīkurvīthāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:224_0: nanu yadyetat prasaṅgākhyaṃ sādhanaṃ pramāṇa, na bhavati [trairūpyābhāvāt] kathamasyopanyāsa iti,
SA19bsa072_u:227_0: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām /
SA19bsa072_u:228_0: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:232_4: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asiddha ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:234_1: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarūpādanyat /
SA19bsa072_u:236_0: yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsiddhirhetordūṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:236_6: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
SA19bsa072_u:237_1: mānasasyāpyahaṃpratyayasya śarīrādiviṣayatvāt gauro 'haṃ sthūlo 'haṃ gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ -
SA19bsa072_u:239_0: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:239_1: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī /
SA19bsa072_u:239_2: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:239_5: na cānyalliṅgamasti / anyenāpi liṅgena bhavatā sādhyavyāptena bhavitavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:239_6: tasya ca sarvathāsiddheḥ, kathaṃ tena vyāptatvaṃ liṅgasya niścīyatām? kiñca,
SA19bsa072_u:239_7: kiyamātmā bodharūpaḥ, abodharūpo vā? yadi bodharūpo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaiphalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:239_9: na vipratipattiḥ / athābodharūpo dṛśyaśca tadānupalambho 'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasiddhiranavadyā /
SA19bsa072_u:241_3: tenāpi pareṣṭārthāsiddheḥ / tatkiṃ nocyate? anaikāntikadūṣaṇenaiva gatārthatvāt pṛthaḍnoktam /
SA19bsa072_u:241_4: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā /
SA19bsa072_u:241_7: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati /
SA19bsa072_u:243_0: nanu sāmānyaṃ cedaprasiddhaṃ, tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:243_1: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:243_3: nanu ko 'yamapoho nāma? yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate,
SA19bsa072_u:243_6: apohyate pṛthak kriyate 'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
SA19bsa072_u:244_3: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:244_4: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho 'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:244_5: tanna yuktam, vyavahārakāle prathamaṃ vartamānasyāpi pratītikramādarśanāt /
SA19bsa072_u:244_6: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati,
SA19bsa072_u:244_12_0: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ
SA19bsa072_u:244_12_1: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt
SA19bsa072_u:244_16: kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām /
SA19bsa072_u:246_0: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:246_3: astitya samartham / asti cāstyādipadaprayogaḥ / tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:247_0: nanu yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭasvarūpe gṛhīte 'paścāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate,
SA19bsa072_u:247_1: tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet,
SA19bsa072_u:247_4: gṛhīte svarūpe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:249_1: anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:249_3: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate /
SA19bsa072_u:249_7: na sarvāḥ, ityatra kāryakāraṇabhāvasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ dṛṣṭasyātivartayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:249_8: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām /
SA19bsa072_u:251_0_0: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi govyaktiṣveva
SA19bsa072_u:251_0_1: samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ
SA19bsa072_u:251_1: tacca pramāṇāsaṅgatam / asmākaṃ tu svabhāvenottaraṃ pramāṇāsiddhatvāt yuktisaṅgatameva /
SA19bsa072_u:252_2: yathā daṇḍijñānam / viśiṣṭajñānaṃ cedaṃ gaurayamityarthataḥ kāryahetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:253_6: yathā svarūpavānayaṃ ghaṭaḥ, gotvasāmānyamiti vā / dvitīyapakṣe tu siddhasādhanam,
SA19bsa072_u:253_7: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitabhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvasyeṣṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:255_0: sāmānyasya niṣedhāya prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatra asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:255_2: nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:255_3: na cāsiddhasambhāvanā / varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rūpasya nipuṇamapi nirūpyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:255_6: na tu cakṣurvijñānagrāhyam / idaṃ [tu sāmānyaṃ] cakṣurvijñānagrāhyamarthadharmatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:255_10: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:257_1: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
SA19bsa072_u:257_2: tatra na tāvannityo yuktaḥ, nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:257_3: yena hi svarūpeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarūpaṃ sargakāle 'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:257_5: tadasat / na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:258_2: buddhimāṃstu karttumīśāno 'pi anicchanna karotīti kastasyopālambhaḥ? ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:258_3: atha svarūpeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:258_5: tarhi mātāpi sati vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat /
SA19bsa072_u:259_0: nanveṣa eva kāryasvabhāvaḥ, kevalāt samarthādapi nodeti, sahakāriṇamapekṣyaiva paścādbhavati [nāsyopālambha iti] tanna yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:259_1: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:259_3: nityasya kramakāritvaniṣedhanam nāpi nityaḥ krameṇa kāryakārīti yuktam,
SA19bsa072_u:261_0: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:261_7: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam /
SA19bsa072_u:263_3: api tu smartavyam / na ca smaraṇasvarūpam pratyakṣam /
SA19bsa072_u:263_4: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt,
SA19bsa072_u:263_5: tatsākṣātkaraṇapravaṇaṃ kathamidaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma? yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ -
SA19bsa072_u:265_1: na tu grahaṇasvarūpameva / smaryamāṇe grahaṇāyogāt, gṛhyamāṇe ca smaraṇāyogāt / na caikasya smaraṇagrahaṇe sambhavataḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:265_2: parasparavirodhāt / yena hi svarūpeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarūpeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:265_7: prayogaścaivam - yaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sa tattvato naikālambanaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:265_9: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:265_11: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:265_13: na tadevedaṃ keśādīti / ata evaikālambanatve pratyabhijñāpratyayasya krametarābhyāmutpattivirodhāt,
SA19bsa072_u:265_16: yasyaiva vicāryamāṇatvāt / tasmāt sthitametat nityaḥ kartā nāstīti /
SA19bsa072_u:265_17: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:268_1: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:273_1: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:273_2: na caiṣa viruddhaḥ, sapakṣe kāminyākāre sambhavāt /
SA19bsa072_u:273_3_0: na cānaikāntikaḥ, abhyāsena sahitacetoguṇasphuṭapratibhāsayoḥ kāraṇakāryayoḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayoriva
SA19bsa072_u:273_4: tathā hi - vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhatvasya paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:273_5: sphuṭābhasaṃvedanamiti trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sphuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:274_0: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati,
SA19bsa072_u:274_9_0: nāpi viruddhaḥ, sapekṣe bhāvāt / na cānaikāntikatā, vacanamātrasya saṃśayaviparyāsapūrvakatve
SA19bsa072_u:274_9_1: 'pi pramāṇa saṃvādi] niścitārthasya [vacanasya] sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā tadarthasākṣātkārijñānapūrvakatvena
SA19bsa072_u:276_0: syādetat / anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate /
SA19bsa072_u:276_3: yathedānīntanaṃ cittam / cittaṃ ca maraṇakālabhāvīti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:276_7: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:276_8: tatastatsiddhaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam /
SA19bsa072_u:282_0: jñānamevedaṃ sarvaṃ nīlādyākāreṇa pratibhāsate, na bāhyo 'rthaḥ, jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt /
SA19bsa072_u:285_0: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate /
SA19bsa072_u:285_1: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate //
SA19bsa072_u:286_1: tadāsti bāhyo 'rtha iti kutaḥ? bāhyārthasiddhistu syādvayatirekataḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:286_2: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante /
SA19bsa072_u:287_2: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum /
SA19bsa072_u:287_3: sa eva bāhyo 'rtha iti, na punarasau bāhyo 'rthaḥ avayavī,
SA19bsa072_u:287_6: tatra na tāvat guṇādayaḥ, dravyaniṣedhenaiva teṣāṃ niṣedhāt /
SA19bsa072_u:287_7: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate /
SA19bsa072_u:287_8: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham /
SA19bsa072_u:289_4: sarvadāhamiti jñānābhāvāt / nāpi viruddhaḥ, sapakṣe darśanāt / na cānaikāntikaḥ, dhūmapāvakayoriva kādācitkajñānakādācitkakāraṇayoḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptisiddheḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:290_0: atha kimākāśaṃ nāma kiñcidvastubhūtamasti? uta nāsti vā? nāstyevaitat /
SA19bsa072_u:290_1: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti /
SA19bsa072_u:290_2: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kva vākāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt? [yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:290_6: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:290_12: yadi punarmano [nityaṃ] syāttadānīmetāni jñānāni na yujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:292_1: tatra yo 'vayavī ghaṭādiḥ paramāṇubhidvaryaṇukādi krameṇārabdhaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:292_3: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
SA19bsa072_u:294_0: ityuktam / nanu ko 'yaṃ bhāgapratibhāso nāma? nānādigdeśāvaṣṣṭambhena sañcitaḥ paramāṇupratibhāsa eva /
SA19bsa072_u:294_4: tasmādyo 'yaṃ nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye 'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:294_10: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
SA19bsa072_u:294_11: tayorekadeśatāprāpteḥ / evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo 'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so 'pi tatra syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:296_0: athavāyaṃ vicāraḥ, yadetatpratibhāsamānaṃ tadekaṃ tāvanna yuktam,
SA19bsa072_u:296_2: tathā hi - yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ? atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraṃ syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:297_0: `dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati /
SA19bsa072_u:299_0: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:299_1: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ? pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo 'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate /
SA19bsa072_u:299_2: tathā hi - sati viṣaye sālambanatā syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:299_3: tena cāvayavinā bhavitavyam, paramāṇupracayena vā / sa cāyamubhayo 'pyanantarokta bādhakapramāṇa [grāha] grastavigraho na vyomatāmarasamatiśete yathoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:302_5: yathaikasmādākāśakeśadarśanāt dvitīyam [jñānaṃ] anālambanācca svapnajñānādaviśiṣṭaṃ vivādāspadībhūtaṃ jāgradvijñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:304_0: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat? grāhyagrāhakādikalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ niṣprapañcavijñānamātraṃ paramārthasat /
SA19bsa072_u:311_0: tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena prasiddham,
SA19bsa072_u:311_1: tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:313_0: anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:313_2: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti /
SA19bsa072_u:313_3: mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat,
SA19bsa072_u:313_4: vicārāsahatvāt / svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke /
SA19bsa072_u:313_6: eko vāneko vā, pūrvavicārāsahatvāt / yathoktam - 'neṣṭaṃ tadapi dhīrāṇā vijñānaṃ pāramārthikam /
SA19bsa072_u:315_1: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣu na vidyate' // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:317_0: `yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā /
SA19bsa072_u:318_0: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat,
SA19bsa072_u:318_1: yathā vyomakamalam,ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:318_2: na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ / sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisphuṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:318_3: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam,
SA19bsa072_u:318_4: tato yattasya bahirbhāve bādhakaṃ tadevāntarbhāve 'pi bādhakam /
SA19bsa072_u:318_6: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vānekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:318_8: na hi tadvijñāne bahirbhāvanibandhanaṃ dūṣaṇam! yena tadbhāvena bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:319_3: / śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:322_0: * yādṛśaṃ pustake dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
SA19bsa072_u:322_1: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate //
